00001 #include "Filesystem.h"
00002 #include <string.h>
00003 #include <stdio.h>
00004 #include "LocalFolder.h"
00005 
00006 FilesystemNode* Filesystem::evaluateChild(Folder* parent, string path) {
00007 
00008         /*
00009          * General plan (Evaluating a path such as ./Data/Folder/ or ./Data/Folder/Stuff.txt)
00010          *
00011          * Check if the path is empty, if it is exit
00012          * Find the location of the first forward slash
00013          * Get the strings on the left and right of the forward slash (E.g. Data and File/Dog/Tootoo.avi)
00014          * Get the strings to the left and right of the forward slash
00015          * Find the node named by the left side
00016          * Recurse, using the node on the left, eventually the path will have no slashes left in it and be passed to the node->search function a few steps above
00017          */
00018 
00019         //Check the path isn't empty
00020         if (path.empty()) {
00021                 return 0;
00022         }
00023 
00024         //Find the location of the first forward slash
00025         size_t firstForwardSlash = path.find_first_of('/');
00026 
00027         //If there are no forward slashes in the path
00028         if (firstForwardSlash == string::npos) {
00029 
00030                 //Pass it to the folder internal search
00031                 return parent->searchForChild(path);
00032 
00033         }
00034 
00035         //Get the part of the string before the forward slash
00036         string leftHandSide = path.substr(0, firstForwardSlash);
00037 
00038         //Try and find that as a node
00039         FilesystemNode* childNode = parent->searchForChild(leftHandSide);
00040 
00041         //If its not found or isn't a folder
00042         if ( /* IF NOT */ ! ( childNode != 0 && childNode->getType() == folderId) ) {
00043                 //Return failure
00044                 return 0;
00045         }
00046 
00047         //Find the right hand side
00048         string rightHandSide = path.substr(firstForwardSlash + 1);
00049 
00050         //If there is nothing on the right hand side it is something like ./Data/Log/, in this case just return the parent node
00051         if ( rightHandSide.empty() ) {
00052                 return childNode;
00053         }
00054 
00055         //Recurse, using a cast of childNode as a folder and the substring of path right of the first forward slash
00056         return Filesystem::evaluateChild( static_cast<Folder*> (childNode), path.substr(firstForwardSlash + 1));
00057 }
00058 
00059 FilesystemNode* Filesystem::search(std::string TargetFile) {
00060 
00061         return Filesystem::evaluateChild(Filesystem::getRoot(), TargetFile);
00062 
00063 }
00064 
00065 DataInputStream* Filesystem::getFileInputStream(std::string targetFile) {
00066 
00067         //Find the node
00068         FilesystemNode* node = Filesystem::search(targetFile);
00069 
00070         //If it failed return null
00071         if (!node) {
00072 
00073                 return 0;
00074         }
00075 
00076         //Check the file type
00077         if (node->getType() != fileId) {
00078                 return 0;
00079         }
00080 
00081         //Convert it to a file
00082         File* toFileNode = static_cast<File*> (node);
00083 
00084         return toFileNode->createInputStream();
00085 }
00086 
00087 DataOutputStream* Filesystem::getFileOutputStream(std::string targetFile) {
00088 
00089         //Find the node
00090         FilesystemNode* node = Filesystem::search(targetFile);
00091 
00092         //If it failed return null
00093         if (!node) {
00094 
00095                 return 0;
00096 
00097         }
00098 
00099         //Check the file type
00100         if (node->getType() != fileId) {
00101                 return 0;
00102         }
00103 
00104         //Convert it to a file
00105         File* toFileNode = static_cast<File*> (node);
00106 
00107         return toFileNode->createOutputStream();
00108 }

00110 static Folder* g_filesystemRoot = 0;
00111 
00112 Folder* Filesystem::getRoot() {
00113 
00114         if (g_filesystemRoot == 0) {
00115 
00116                 g_filesystemRoot = new LocalFolder("Root", "./");
00117                 g_filesystemRoot->refresh();
00118         }
00119 
00120         return g_filesystemRoot;
00121 }
